attributes.action: Exit the united kingdom. Gain our countries back.
attributes.additional_details: The goverment need to admit they are not sovereign. And the power needs to go back to the people. Our rights need to be back on the school syllabus. The next generation should learn the proper grama. And lead us to a better future. The union is not working for the people and our rights are being stripped away one by one. The england and wales documents need to protect us from the uk ltd Stop the regional division. Gain our parish. Boroughs. Shires. Etc back a d let each run thier own laws. We would be stronger constitutionally. We would be covered under constitutional law for more protection sovereign citizens
attributes.background: I detailed referendum of exiting the united kingdom.

rejection.details:
We are not clear what action you are seeking from the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition setting this out more clearly.
